PERSONA:
meet john, a 55-year-old white, non-hispanic man residing in a metropolitan area of the northeast, specifically in the middle atlantic region. he is a high school graduate with no further formal education.

john was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. he is married and follows the roman catholic faith, attending religious services once or twice a month. despite not identifying as a born-again or evangelical christian, his religious beliefs align with traditional catholic values.

politically, john leans towards the republican party and considers himself a conservative. he is a registered voter and takes an active interest in political affairs. with a family income exceeding $100,000, he falls into the upper-income tier.

in his daily life, john is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not engage in any voluntary work or community service activities.

overall, john is a middle-aged, conservative-leaning catholic man from an affluent background, deeply rooted in his local metropolitan community and actively involved in civic matters through his voting participation.
